question: [File: aptos-core/crates/transaction-emitter/src/diag.rs] [Function: diag()] [Submit_single_transaction Return Value] Can the deadline returned by submit_single_transaction at line 28 be None or invalid, causing incorrect timeout checks at line 70? (Medium)
